Trade/Device Name(s): ISE Module for the DataProTM Plus
ISE Module for the DataPro™ Plus Clinical Chemistry Analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ISE Module for the DataPro™ Plus Clinical Chemistry Analyzer for quantitative measurement of sodium, potassium, and chloride in serum using ion-selective electrodes.
Indications for Use Summary: The ISE module of the DataPro™ Plus Clinical Chemistry Analyzer is intended for the quantitative determination of sodium, potassium, and chloride in serum using ion-selective electrodes.
